sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>42</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/42</github_url> <message>While JSUtil.notNil is awesome, do keep in mind that it does not work for empty object. Use JSUtil.isEmpty for checking objects.  Sample: gs.print("This does not work for object JSUtil.notNil({}):"+JSUtil.notNil({}));  gs.print("This works for empty object JSUtil.isEmpty({}):"+JSUtil.isEmpty({}));   var obj = {a:1}; gs.print("Not a empty object JSUtil.isEmpty(obj):"+JSUtil.isEmpty(obj));</message> <number>TIL0001036</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-20 14:00:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>70d0a70b1bb89c108ed631d7dc4bcb84</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>Empty Object Check</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
